SEARCH
Package com.erudika.para.core.annotations

Annotation Interface Email

@Email(message="Please provide a valid email address") @Pattern(regexp="[A-Za-z0-9.%\'+_\\-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.\\-]+\\.[A-Za-z\\S]{2,20}$", message="Please provide a valid email address") @Target({METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Constraint(validatedBy={}) @Documented public @interface Email
Annotation for email validation.
Author:
Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
